SEARCH
Package com.meteordevelopments.duels.api.match

Interface Match

public interface Match
Represents an ongoing Match.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Arena

    The Arena this Match is taking place in.

    The bet amount for this Match.

  • Method Details

    • getArena

      @NotNull Arena getArena()
      The Arena this Match is taking place in.
      Returns:
      Arena this Match is taking place in.

    • getStart

      long getStart()
      The start of this match Match milliseconds. Note: System.currentTimeMillis() subtracted by the result of this method will give the duration of the current Match in milliseconds.
      Returns:
      start of this match in milliseconds.

    • getKit

      @Nullable Kit getKit()
      The Kit used in this Match.
      Returns:
      Kit used in this Match or null if players are using their own inventories.

    • getItems

      @NotNull List<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> getItems(@NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      UnmodifiableList of ItemStacks the player has bet for this Match.
      Parameters:
      player - Player to get the list of bet items.
      Returns:
      Never-null UnmodifiableList of ItemStacks the player has bet for this Match.

    • getBet

      int getBet()
      The bet amount for this Match.
      Returns:
      bet Bet amount for this Match or 0 if no bet was specified.

    • isFinished

      boolean isFinished()
      Whether or not this Match is finished.
      Returns:
      true if this Match has finished or false otherwise.
      Since:
      3.4.1

    • getPlayers

      @NotNull Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getPlayers()
      UnmodifiableSet of alive players in this Match.
      Returns:
      Never-null UnmodifiableSet of alive players in this Match.
      Since:
      3.1.0

    • getStartingPlayers

      @NotNull Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getStartingPlayers()
      UnmodifiableSet of players who started this Match. Note: This set includes players who are offline. If you keep a reference to this match, all the player objects of those who started this match will not be garbage-collected.
      Returns:
      Never-null UnmodifiableSet of players who started this Match.
      Since:
      3.4.1
